mapper.insert: insert into school (sc_category, sc_hi_name, sc_hi_transfer, sc_hi_check, sc_hi_iphack, sc_hi_jolup, sc_hi_major, sc_uni_category, sc_uni_name, sc_uni_transfer, sc_uni_major, sc_uni_check, sc_uni_iphack, sc_uni_jolup, sc_uni_grade, sc_uni_sum) values (#{sc_category }, #{sc_hi_name },#{sc_hi_transfer },#{sc_hi_check },#{sc_hi_iphack },#{sc_hi_jolup },#{sc_hi_major }, #{sc_uni_category },#{sc_uni_name }, #{sc_uni_transfer },#{sc_uni_major },#{sc_uni_check },#{sc_uni_iphack }, #{sc_uni_jolup },#{sc_uni_grade },#{sc_uni_sum })
